nodes.text: Derla Pidys was a female alien who was one of the galaxy's most renowned liquor traders. At some point she visited a club in Canto Bight owned by Ubialla Gheal to purchase a bottle of wine. Her large head had four yellow eyes, two upper and two lower eyes.
Derla Pidys was portrayed by actress Latesha Wilson in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017.
